nodes.text: Goatgrass: the Tale of Ree-Yees is a short story that appeared in the Tales from Jabba's Palace anthology, published in January 1996 by Bantam Spectra. It was written by Deborah Wheeler. The story provides the backstory of the Gran, Ree-Yees who was present in Jabba's Palace in 4 ABY. The title is a reference to Goatgrass, a preferred food among Gran.
